preliminize module¶

MIT License

Author: Chris Davis

preliminize.preliminize(text='Preliminary', ax=None, dpi=100, **kwargs)[source]¶

A very simple code for adding words to a figure.

Parameters:
  • text (str, default "Preliminary") – Text we add to figure.
  • ax (matplotlib axis) – What axis?
  • dpi (integer, default 100) – dpi used to make figures. Need to use this if your dpi is NOT 100
  • kwargs (goes into the text) –
Returns:
Return type:

axis that is preliminized
